div.p: I was taken from my parents at the age of 3, I was put into an abusive situation with a foster carer, I have a younger brother who was also
in that abusive situation with me so we pretty much teamed up until I was about 16 when I went into a modern care home situation and have been
bounced off every foster family you can think of ever since. I ended up in something called Solutions back then, shared housing, all shared
and actually ended up living with these people as a guest, almost, for a while, I was with them for 5 years and they’ve pretty much adopted me as a son.
Since then I’ve come out of care and I’ve been living on my own. I’ve learnt to be very thankful for every chance I’ve had and my background has been
very punishing personally and to be given chances they don’t just get thrown at you and when one does get thrown at you take it
and give it your all and I’ve learnt to do that very quickly.
